meanings.definition: The quality or state of being deserving of praise.
meanings.sent1: Her praiseworthinesses shone through when she helped the elderly lady cross the street.
meanings.sent2: The team's praiseworthinesses was evident in their dedication to community service.
meanings.sent3: His praiseworthinesses in always remembering everyone's birthdays made him the office hero.
meanings.sent4: The praiseworthinesses of the firefighter's bravery blazed like a beacon in the night.
meanings.sent5: The praiseworthinesses of her actions echoed through the halls of the school.

meanings.definition: The act of being commendable or laudable.
meanings.sent1: The praiseworthinesses of his honesty was admired by all.
meanings.sent2: Their praiseworthinesses in standing up for what is right inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent3: The praiseworthinesses of her baking skills made her the star of the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The praiseworthinesses of the artist's masterpiece left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The praiseworthinesses of his leadership skills guided the team to success.
